shortDesc: Noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with long battery life
detailsDesc: Enjoy immersive audio with advanced noise-cancellation technology. Comfortable over-ear design, 40-hour battery life, and Bluetooth 5.0 for stable connectivity.

shortDesc: Track your heart rate, steps, and sleep with ease
detailsDesc: Waterproof fitness tracker with heart rate monitor, GPS tracking, sleep analysis, and 7-day battery. Syncs seamlessly with Android and iOS.

shortDesc: Compact and powerful sound with deep bass
detailsDesc: Wireless speaker with rich stereo sound, deep bass, and up to 12 hours of playtime. Features waterproof casing and built-in mic for calls.

shortDesc: Capture high-resolution videos and photos on the go
detailsDesc: Rugged and waterproof action cam with 4K video recording, 16MP photo capture, image stabilization, and Wi-Fi connectivity. Comes with mounting accessories.

shortDesc: Ergonomic mouse with customizable buttons and lighting
detailsDesc: High-performance gaming mouse with 7 programmable buttons, 16.8M RGB color lighting, adjustable DPI up to 16,000, and ergonomic comfort design.

shortDesc: Take aerial shots and videos with ease
detailsDesc: Compact drone with 720p HD camera, one-key takeoff/landing, altitude hold, and headless mode. Perfect for beginners and kids.

shortDesc: Adjustable aluminum stand for better posture and airflow
detailsDesc: Ergonomic stand compatible with laptops up to 17 inches. Foldable, lightweight design with anti-slip pads and cooling airflow support.

shortDesc: Fast charging pad for smartphones and earbuds
detailsDesc: Slim, Qi-certified charger with 10W fast charging for compatible devices. Soft LED indicator, overheat protection, and case-friendly design.
Durable and stylish backpack with padded laptop sleeve, multiple compartments, anti-theft pocket, and water-resistant exterior. Ideal for work or travel.

shortDesc: Touch control LED lamp with adjustable brightness
detailsDesc: Minimalist LED desk lamp with 3 brightness levels, touch-sensitive controls, USB charging port, and foldable arm. Energy-efficient and eye-caring.
